title: Mental Self-Care and the Power of Sufism | Saloumeh Bozorgzadeh
description:
We live in a crazy and busy world, and sometimes we forget to take care of ourselves. So I have Saloumeh Bozorgzadeh with me today to talk about the Sufi Psychology Association and how Sufism can help any of us with our own mental self-care. We talk about how to care for ourselves, how to care for our caregivers, and the power of our inner voice and where it comes from.

Saloumeh Bozorgzadeh is a licensed clinical psychologist and the President of The Sufi Psychology Association.The Sufi Psychology Association utilizes the teachings of the M.T.O. Shahmaghsoudi速 School of Islamic Sufism in its approach to psychology. M.T.O. Sufi Psychology速 is about each individual knowing themselves completely.
